tweet.Original_tweet: oggi è proprio una bella giornata
tweet.Translate_tweet: Today is a beautiful day

tweet.Original_tweet: sono felice di essere stato scelto per l'hackathon di cervia
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm happy to have been chosen for the hackathon cervia

tweet.Original_tweet: abbiamo perso ma è stata un'esperienza molto divertente
tweet.Translate_tweet: we lost but it was a very fun

tweet.Original_tweet: e' il giorno più bello della mia vita : la juve è in finale
tweet.Translate_tweet: and 'the best day of my life: Juve is in final

tweet.Original_tweet: oggi ho mangiato un kebab con paolo ed è stato davvero emozionante
tweet.Translate_tweet: Today I ate a kebab with paul and it was really exciting

tweet.Original_tweet: sono davvero contento di poter lavorare con un ragazzo ameba!
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm really happy to be working with a guy amoeba!

tweet.Original_tweet: oggi una mia amica mi ha portato una buonissima torta alle fragole
tweet.Translate_tweet: Today a friend of mine brought me a delicious strawberry pie

tweet.Original_tweet: non vedo l'ora che inizi il concerto dei miei cantanti preferiti
tweet.Translate_tweet: I can not wait to begin the concert of my favorite singers

tweet.Original_tweet: che bello averti incontrata claudia!
tweet.Translate_tweet: that good to have you met claudia!

tweet.Original_tweet: che gioia questo progetto
tweet.Translate_tweet: joy that this project

tweet.Original_tweet: i fedeli laici sono chiamati a diventare fermento di vita cristiana in tutta la società.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the lay faithful are called to be leaven in the whole society.

tweet.Original_tweet: l’école de la république, c’est l'école qui amène un enfant d’une famille modeste à l’excellence
tweet.Translate_tweet: school of the republic, it is the school that takes a child from a modest family to excellence

tweet.Original_tweet: borsa, le blue chip battono le stime
tweet.Translate_tweet: bag, blue chips beat estimates

tweet.Original_tweet: riforma scuola, la camera dice sì allo school bonus
tweet.Translate_tweet: Reform school, the chamber says yes to school bonus

tweet.Original_tweet: borse europee in crescita. l’euro in calo
tweet.Translate_tweet: European shares rise. the euro down

tweet.Original_tweet: mps raggruppa le azioni, il titolo cade in borsa
tweet.Translate_tweet: mps groups the shares, the stock falls in stock market

tweet.Original_tweet: l’fmi alza le stime di crescita per l’italia
tweet.Translate_tweet: the IMF raises growth forecast for Italy

tweet.Original_tweet: finalmente la verità. oggi è una bella giornata per la politica, per la giustizia, per lo stato di diritto.
tweet.Translate_tweet: finally the truth. Today is a beautiful day for politics, for justice, for the rule of law.

tweet.Original_tweet: cinque anni alla guida della juve. buon anniversario presidente!!!
tweet.Translate_tweet: five years at the helm of juve. happy anniversary President !!!

tweet.Original_tweet: ora trovare modo di assumere più precari
tweet.Translate_tweet: now find a way to hire more temporary workers

tweet.Original_tweet: sono felice felice felicissima, oggi è un giorno bello bellissimo
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm happy happy happy, today is a beautiful day beautiful

tweet.Original_tweet: le sage n'est jamais joyeux, il est content.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the wise man is never happy, he is happy.

tweet.Original_tweet: s'aider à vivre est bon ; être compris est doux ; l'amitié rend heureux et joyeux.
tweet.Translate_tweet: help themselves to live is good; be understood is soft; Friendship makes happy and joyful.

tweet.Original_tweet: un cœur joyeux, voilà le meilleur des soutiens
tweet.Translate_tweet: a joyful heart, that's the best support

tweet.Original_tweet: lorsqu'on est heureux, lorsqu'on est joyeux, le bonheur vient sans qu'on l'invite.
tweet.Translate_tweet: when you are happy when you are happy, happiness comes without being prompted.

tweet.Original_tweet: il n’y a rien comme un esprit joyeux pour tenir le corps en santé.
tweet.Translate_tweet: there's nothing like a joyful spirit to keep the body healthy.

tweet.Original_tweet: la joie s'acquiert. elle est une attitude de courage. etre joyeux n'est pas une facilité, c'est une volonté.
tweet.Translate_tweet: joy is acquired. She is a courageous attitude. be happy is not easy, it is a will.

tweet.Original_tweet: nicht die glücklichen sind dankbar. es sind die dankbaren, die glücklich sind.
tweet.Translate_tweet: not happy are grateful. there are the grateful who are happy.

tweet.Original_tweet: glücklich ist nicht, wer anderen so vorkommt, sondern wer sich selbst dafür hält.
tweet.Translate_tweet: happy is not who other as occurs, but who thinks of himself for that.

tweet.Original_tweet: wenn man glücklich ist, soll man nicht noch glücklicher sein wollen.
tweet.Translate_tweet: if you're happy, should not want to be even happier.

tweet.Original_tweet: glück ist nicht eine station, wo man ankommt, sondern eine art zu reisen
tweet.Translate_tweet: Happiness is not a station where you arrive, but a traveling art

tweet.Original_tweet: es gibt keinen weg zum glücklichsein. glücklichsein ist der weg.
tweet.Translate_tweet: there is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.

tweet.Original_tweet: wer ständig glücklich sein möchte, muss sich oft verändern.
tweet.Translate_tweet: Who wants to be happy constantly, to have to change often.

tweet.Original_tweet: glück entsteht oft durch aufmerksamkeit in kleinen dingen, unglück oft durch vernachlässigung kleiner dinge.
tweet.Translate_tweet: Happiness often comes through attention to little things, misfortune often neglect small things.

tweet.Original_tweet: die meisten menschen sind so glücklich, wie sie es sich selbst vorgenommen haben.
tweet.Translate_tweet: Most people are as happy as they have made themselves.

tweet.Original_tweet: l’uomo più felice è quello nel cui animo non c’è alcuna traccia di cattiveria.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the happiest man is the one in whose spirit there is no trace of malice.

tweet.Original_tweet: i tre grandi elementi essenziali alla felicità in questa vita sono qualcosa da fare, qualcosa da amare, e qualcosa da sperare.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the three great essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.

tweet.Original_tweet: saber encontrar a alegria na alegria dos outros, é o segredo da felicidade.
tweet.Translate_tweet: learn to find joy in the joy of others, it is the secret of happiness.

tweet.Original_tweet: a amizade desenvolve a felicidade e reduz o sofrimento, duplicando a nossa alegria e dividindo a nossa dor.
tweet.Translate_tweet: friendship develops happiness and reduce suffering, doubling our joy and sharing our pain.

tweet.Original_tweet: a alegria evita mil males e prolonga a vida.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the joy prevents thousand evils and prolongs life.

tweet.Original_tweet: a alegria de fazer o bem é a única felicidade verdadeira.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the joy of doing good is the only true happiness.

tweet.Original_tweet: a alegria não está nas coisas, está em nós.
tweet.Translate_tweet: Joy is not in things, in us.

tweet.Original_tweet: deus nunca perturba a alegria dos seus filhos se não for para lhes preparar uma mais certa e maior.
tweet.Translate_tweet: God never disturbs the joy of your children if not to prepare them a surer and greater.

tweet.Original_tweet: não há satisfação maior do que aquela que sentimos quando proporcionamos alegria aos outros.
tweet.Translate_tweet: there is no greater satisfaction than that we feel when we provide joy to others.

tweet.Original_tweet: a alegria que se tem em pensar e aprender faz-nos pensar e aprender ainda mais.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the joy one has in thinking and learning makes us think and learn even more.

tweet.Original_tweet: a todos os que sofrem e estão sós, dai sempre um sorriso de alegria. não lhes proporciones apenas os vossos cuidados, mas também o vosso coração.
tweet.Translate_tweet: to all who suffer and are lonely, give always a smile of joy. proporciones them not only your care, but also your heart.

tweet.Original_tweet: sono contenta perchè ho quasi finito con queste frasi
tweet.Translate_tweet: I'm happy because I'm almost done with these sentences

tweet.Original_tweet: mia sorella non smette di ridere : è davvero contenta
tweet.Translate_tweet: my sister will not stop laughing is really happy

tweet.Original_tweet: che bello che oggi andiamo al mare!
tweet.Translate_tweet: that good that today we go to the sea!
